title: Hour 3 - Matt Holliday (03-30-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Matt Holliday (03-30-20)
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb, in for Dan Patrick, look at what they miss the most from sports over the last two weeks. Doug explains why he believes this year's NCAA tournament would have been lackluster. Former MLB OF Matt Holliday joins the guys to discuss what the shortened season may look like and give his reactions to the new CBA. Plus, how are the guys spending their quarantine?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
